程序包 com.khjxiaogu.WeaponSkills.skill

接口 Skill

  • public interface Skill

    • 方法概要

      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      SkillPriority getExecutionPriority()
      获取该技能的伤害事件执行时间.设置为null则不执行伤害事件 returns the event execution time in bukkit of damage events,returns null indicates that this skill has no damage events
      java.lang.String getName()
      获取该技能的名字 returns name of this skill,must be unique
      int getPriority()
      已过时。
      暂未有效，仍然按照技能安装顺序执行/currently,it is has not been implemented
      void onBeDamageByEntity​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageByEntityEvent ev, int level)
      有此技能的玩家遭到实体攻击时呼叫 called when a player with this skill attacked by an entity.
      void onBeDamaged​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageEvent ev, int level)
      有此技能的玩家受到伤害时呼叫，被实体攻击时也会呼叫。
      void onDoDamage​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageByEntityEvent ev, int level)
      有此技能的玩家攻击时呼叫 called when a player with this skill attacks others
      void onRightClickBlock​(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent ev, int level)
      有此技能的玩家右键方块时呼叫 called when a player with this skill interact a block
      void onRightClickEntity​(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEntityEvent ev, int level)
      有此技能的玩家右键实体时呼叫 called when a player with this skill interact an entity

    • 方法详细资料

      • onDoDamage

        void onDoDamage​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageByEntityEvent ev,
                int level)
        有此技能的玩家攻击时呼叫 called when a player with this skill attacks others
        参数:
        ev - 攻击事件 attack event
        level - 等级

      • onRightClickEntity

        void onRightClickEntity​(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEntityEvent ev,
                        int level)
        有此技能的玩家右键实体时呼叫 called when a player with this skill interact an entity
        参数:
        ev - 交互事件 interact event
        level - 等级

      • onRightClickBlock

        void onRightClickBlock​(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent ev,
                       int level)
        有此技能的玩家右键方块时呼叫 called when a player with this skill interact a block
        参数:
        ev - 交互事件 interact event
        level - 等级

      • onBeDamageByEntity

        void onBeDamageByEntity​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageByEntityEvent ev,
                        int level)
        有此技能的玩家遭到实体攻击时呼叫 called when a player with this skill attacked by an entity.
        参数:
        ev - 受击事件 attack event
        level - 等级

      • onBeDamaged

        void onBeDamaged​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageEvent ev,
                 int level)
        有此技能的玩家受到伤害时呼叫，被实体攻击时也会呼叫。 called when a player with this skill being damaged,would also called if damaged by an entity.
        参数:
        ev - 受伤事件 damage event
        level - 等级

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        获取该技能的名字 returns name of this skill,must be unique
        返回:
        技能名字 name of this skill

      • getPriority

        int getPriority()
        已过时。
        暂未有效，仍然按照技能安装顺序执行/currently,it is has not been implemented
        获取该技能的优先级，默认0 returns priority of this skill,higher priority executes first
        返回:
        技能优先级

      • getExecutionPriority

        SkillPriority getExecutionPriority()
        获取该技能的伤害事件执行时间.设置为null则不执行伤害事件 returns the event execution time in bukkit of damage events,returns null indicates that this skill has no damage events
        返回:
        执行顺序/execution order
